root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 7-1-1, translated into en
root.data: The World Bankâ€™s Global Electrification Database estimates using a multilevel nonparametric modelling approach, was adapted to predict electricity access and applied for all countries with at least one data point. While the country (at national level) using based on real survey data reported for all years available. This is the main cause for data discrepancies. The quality and accuracy of population data can also lead to differences in assessing electrification
